channel.title: Overloads
channel.description: Anyone know how i could make it so you can't use overloads under 50 hp, i've tried but failed when doing so, so if anyone knows how, help me and ill rep :D

item.title: Overloads
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Andrew, get on MSN.

Read full topic

item.title: Overloads
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“purestmage74, post:4, topic:424731”]Kinda like what he said.
You’d want to find the code where all the damage/gfx are done for the overload.
Right under the case: or the first ‘if’ statement add this below it (simple return).

[code]case 10333: //Overload
if (c.playerHP <= 50) {
c.sendMessage(“You can’t drink this, you’d kill yourself!”);
}

//Lower Health & Perform your overload stage here

break;[/code][/quote]
K thanks ill work around with it.

Read full topic

item.title: Overloads
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

Kinda like what he said.
You’d want to find the code where all the damage/gfx are done for the overload.
Right under the case: or the first ‘if’ statement add this below it (simple return).

[code]case 10333: //Overload
if (c.playerHP <= 50) {
c.sendMessage(“You can’t drink this, you’d kill yourself!”);
return;
}

//Lower Health & Perform your overload stage here

break;[/code]

EDIT: I forgot to add return… (fixed)

Read full topic

Find the class that represents your player, like in Hyperion it would be entity or player, and find out what handles the hp, and in the code handling the overloads you could,

if (METHODFORPLAYERHP > 50) {
